effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.

flavorTexts.text:
The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack
its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.
